title: Sweet Pea and Zucchini Soup

ingredients.content: 1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra to grease
½ tsp salt, plus extra to season eggs, divided
2 pinches ground black pepper, plus extra to season eggs, divided
4 oz leeks, in pieces, white part only
24 oz sweet peas, fresh or frozen

preparations.content: Lightly grease four ramekins (4 oz ea.). Crack an egg into each ramekin, season eggs with salt and pepper, to taste and place two ramekins into Varoma dish and two onto Varoma tray. Set Varoma aside.
Place leeks, garlic, 1 tbsp oil, ½ tsp salt and 2 pinches pepper into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>5 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add zucchini, peas, stock and lemon juice. Place Varoma with ramekins into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10-12 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>, just until egg whites are set.
Remove Varoma and keep warm. Add whipping cream into mixing bowl, insert measuring cup and blend <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 4<b>-8<b> increasing speed gradually.
Pour hot soup into bowls and top each serving with arugula and a reserved steamed egg. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Take care, this recipe contains raw or lightly cooked eggs.
Wash vegetables, herbs and fruit before use.
Serve with a drizzle of olive oil or cream.
